headline: Pfizer Inc. (PFE): Among Blue Chip Stocks to Invest in at 52-Week Lows

headline: Eli Lilly Vs. Novo Nordisk: Which Is The Better Bargain For Investors
summary: Eli Lilly and Novo Nordisk occupy leading positions in the obesity and diabetes markets. Find out which is the better bargain for investors.

headline: abrdn Healthcare Investors Q4 2024 Commentary
